channel.title: Posts on Skalman

item.title: Houseplan CTF
item.description: Houseplan CTF This was a crazy CTF, organized by Hack Club and hosted by RiceTeaCatPanda. Organized as we are, we never even realized who or what organized this CTF. But apparently Hack Club is the world largest network of high schoolers/students who are in for a game of ‘lets blow some shit up’ (responsibly that is). Fun! CTF Time Start: Friday 24-04-2020 21:00 (CET) End: Sunday 26-04-2020 21:00 (CET) Categories: Beginner, Crypto, Forensics, Misc, OSINT, Pwn, Reverse Engineering, Web “Where is Elon?

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello cruel Covid-19 riddled world. We are live on this Friday, ready to play some CTF this weekend! Stay tuned for write-ups, enjoy our (future) content and hack responsibly! Cheers, Skalman
